Description:
Discover how Microsoft 365 Copilot customers Carrier, Mastercard and Vodafone successfully rolled out Copilot. Learn how they activated leaders and champions, enabled users, and created inspiring, hands-on experiences to drive adoption and usage.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.
